price: 18. No hay palabra que (el hombre) pronuncie sin que haya un ángel siempre vigilante preparado para registrarla.
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
